content.body: In Tokyo a few folks expressed an interest in discussing an Abort protocol compatible with AbortSignal, etc. I've added a discussion to the agenda for NYC to discuss and have started framing some thoughts around it here -- https://github.com/jasnell/discussion-abort-protocol ... these are just my initial thoughts around the general problem space. For folks who have an interest, we can use that repo for some pre-discussion. It's pre-proposal .. that is, i'm intentionally not trying to ask for a Stage 1 proposal yet as I think there are details we need to make sure there's alignment on before we advance to a proposal stage
